name: Autonomous Dev Agent - Multi-Stage Quality Pipeline

nodes.name: Get Work Queue from Data Table
nodes.notes: Fetch pending issues from cached Linear queue

nodes.name: Packetize Work Items
nodes.notes: Prepare work packets with metadata for processing

nodes.name: Route by Phase
nodes.notes: Determine which processing phase this packet is in

nodes.name: Build Initial Implementation Prompt
nodes.notes: Create detailed prompt with context and requirements

nodes.name: Execute Validation (Claude Opus)
nodes.notes: Use Claude Opus for high-quality code review

nodes.name: Generate Improvement Tasks
nodes.notes: ACCEPT: Create iteration packets for improvements

nodes.name: Generate Correction Task
nodes.notes: REJECT: Create corrective action with improved prompts

nodes.name: Merge Task Paths
nodes.notes: Combine outputs from all decision paths

nodes.name: Prepare Correction
nodes.notes: Setup for re-execution with improved prompts

nodes.name: Format Correction Output
nodes.notes: Prepare to loop back through validation

main.node: Get Work Queue from Data Table
